FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Check out common questions about Golden Wave services
FAQ.q1: Is there a minimum contract period?
FAQ.a1: The basic contract period is 3 months. Marketing requires time for data accumulation and optimization, so you need at least 3 months to see meaningful results.
FAQ.a2: Yes, plan fees are agency fees, and actual ad spend is separate. Ad costs are charged directly to the client account for transparent management.
FAQ.q3: What industries are you strong in?
FAQ.a3: We have success stories in various industries including e-commerce, SaaS, education, beauty, and F&B. We have specialized teams for each industry who develop strategies based on deep understanding.
FAQ.q4: What happens if there are no results?
FAQ.a4: We offer performance-linked options that adjust fees based on agreed KPI achievement rates. Detailed terms can be discussed during consultation.
FAQ.a5: Starter plan includes monthly reports; Growth and above plans include weekly reports and real-time dashboards. Reports include key KPIs, insights, and next action items.
FAQ.q6: Do I need to transfer my existing ad account?
FAQ.a6: No, you can keep using your existing ad account. We just need admin access to operate, and all data and assets remain yours when the contract ends.
